rules_text:
Trample, menace
[i]For the Freedom of Fódlan – [/i]Creature cards in your graveyard have escape {1}{B}{R}, exile three other cards. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)[/i]
[i]Mighty King of Legend[/i] – Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Nemesis, King of Liberation.
[i]Keen Intuition[/i] – Creatures you control have ward – Sacrifice a permanent.
